shulkerdropstwo-fabric.duskconfig.title: Shulker Drops Two Config
shulkerdropstwo-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_a: Ignore the drop chance (default 50%) that a Shulker will drop their shell and instead makes them always drop it.
shulkerdropstwo-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_s: Sets the amount of shells Shulkers drop.
